Detailed Description

Widget for displaying/manipulating a DzIntProperty or DzFloatProperty.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzNumericNodePropertyWgt::NodeDisplay

The various modes that determine when the image menu is displayed in the interface

Enumerator:
PropertyDependent 

Node menu is displayed depending on the properties added to the widget

AlwaysDisplayNode 

Node menu is always displayed regardless of the properties added to the widget

NeverDisplayNode 

Node menu is always hidden regardless of the properties added to the widget
